The year 460 (19 March 1011â€“17 March 1012)

Now in 460 of the Armenian era the king Basil collected an army, and went against the land of the Bulgarians, and he defeated their kingdom. And he put many districts to the sword with great ferocity. and he delivered all the West to ruin and captivity and wiped out and exterminated the entire Bulgarian kingdom. and he made Alosian, the brave Bulgarian king, drink a deadly poison. and in this manner removed him from life. And, taking his wife and his sons, he took them away to Constantinople.
